Class.name: SearchingFile
Class.summary: Represents a readonly structure for specifying a file to be searched, including optional parameters.

Instance.name: Path
Instance.summary: Gets the path of the file to be searched.
Instance.returns: The path of the file to be searched.

Instance.name: IgnoreIfNotExists
Instance.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore the file if it does not exist (default is false).
Instance.returns: A value indicating whether to ignore the file if it does not exist.

Ctor.name: SearchingFile[]
Ctor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure with the specified file path.
Ctor.param: The path of the file to be searched.
